website_summaries.verdict: Made from extremely durable plastic composite, these lifters can hold some serious weight. So you can cast aside your worries, and stay "Easygoing.
pros: While safe to use on your hardwood floors, these risers can give your bed an extra 3 inches of rise and have a collective weight limit of 5,720 pounds!
cons: If the legs of your bed happen to be particularly skinny and don't have much surface area to distribute the weight, there is the possibility of them breaking through the top

website_summaries.verdict: These bed risers are intended for use with beds of all shapes and sizes.
pros: Constructed from high-end plastic that can support up to 5,720 pounds
Make it easy to raise the foot or head of a bed
Can be stacked together when not in use
Create 3 inches of space, providing you with extra room to store blankets, sheets, pillows, and other items under a bed
Feature a raised edge to help keep a bed post in place
cons: Bed risers are flimsy and sometimes slide when used on wood floors

customer_reviews.title: Broke as soon as I set them up
customer_reviews.text: We have an IKEA full size bed that is too low for me, so bought these to raise the bed. I chose this brand because it said Amazon Recommended. Not sure how Amazon decides on recommendations. Two of the risers broke as soon as I set them up. They cracked and didn't last 30 seconds. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: finemoves

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in tilting bed to help with reflux
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for our use. Doctor recommended raising the head of our bed to help with reflux, etc. Our king-size bed frame has three legs at the end, so the 4-pack of these risers was enough, and we have one extra riser now. These worked well to raise the top of the bed 3 inches higher. It took a couple of nights to get used to it, but this angle actually seems to help, and much more comfortable than those wedge-type pillows. The risers also seem very strong and durable. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: S Otto

customer_reviews.title: Useful product. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking of ways to increase my table height as my chair would get obstructed. This was causing me to bend forward and hurting my back during long working hours. Bounced upon this item while googling for options to increase the height. The product is sturdy and did the job that I was looking for. Very happy. Although I would expect them to make some other colors that match with furniture. Such as walnut, brown etc.
customer_reviews.author: Manish

customer_reviews.title: I was super skeptical that these would be stable
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical that these would be stable. I have a cheapo bed with metal legs and I was convinced it would shift and topple off these risers. HOWEVER, they've been great - totally unnoticeable and stable. They don't make the bed too high but just enough lift for some extra under bed storage. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I used these to raise up a desk by chair would not fit under. They work very well. This is a large antique solid wood desk. These risers don't flex or move. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Schwindt

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Even though I've only had them for a few days, they are working perfectly. I used them (2 sets) on my sofa and love seat. The way they are engineered, you can use them as shown with the wider side down. I didn't need that height, so I flipped them and put the legs inside the cavity - - perfect height. Can't say how they'll hold up with many butts in the seats for the holidays, but I'm pleased now.
customer_reviews.author: M J Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed risers: sturdy and easy to use, hold corner posts diameter suitable for metal and wood bed frames. I lucked out with these and could not be happier, now I can store so much under the bed with all standard containers..
customer_reviews.author: seattle gal 2000

customer_reviews.title: Just What Is Needed
customer_reviews.text: I have routinely used bed risers. Needed new ones because the old ones went with my daughter when she moved out. They are sturdy, easy to 'install' (2 people were needed), and raise the bed just enough to make it comfy to sit on while providing storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.author: J. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for about 4 months now, with a relatively heavy wooden bed frame in place. They get the job done, I haven't felt even the slightest concern about shifting/buckling, and I can now fit more boxes under the bed. Worth the money. Update: Still going strong, almost a year later
customer_reviews.author: FloribundaMorosa

customer_reviews.title: Terrific & Study
customer_reviews.text: Downsizing from a large house to moderate townhome, was a challenge but the Ryehaliligear Bed Risers gave us plenty of room for needed storage. They hold their own against ONE person in the house (ahem -- it's me) who is a large-framed gent & needs a sturdy base! When I write that we need sturdy, trust me! We do!! Great product; would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianBear

customer_reviews.title: Slides on hardwood
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my aging parents to help them get up from their couch. The height was excellent, but the raisers did not stay put on their hardwood floors. We had to add a small non-slip carpet pad under them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, strong, non-descript and makes our bed ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, strong, non-descript and makes our bed high enough to store things under and to line up with our co-sleeper for baby. Exactly what we needed, but wish they came in a slightly larger size. We used them on the diagonal, which fits but makes our bed stand away from the wall a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Kiva

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Furniture Risers
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to raise the height of my computer desk. They are a great height for this task and sturdy enough for the solid wood legs of my table.
customer_reviews.author: michelle v

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: These gizmos are not made to support a lot of weight. You can try them. They may last for awhile. Better off with something more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Starkist89

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your $$.
customer_reviews.text: Positioned under couch. After falling over twice I removed to find one (of four) had just about collapsed & failed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: have several in different heights.
customer_reviews.text: just the right height to raise my chair. Did screw them in because the feet on my chair or as large as outside of these. But also doing that makes it more sturdy. They are on a wooden floor and do not slip when I get up which I can do now without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent I needed space under that bed and this fixed my issue
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty and Nifty Consignment

customer_reviews.title: I could not have them in the house.
customer_reviews.text: The odor of the plastic was overwhelmingly unpleasant. I kept them in the garage for a couple of weeks to air them out, and they still smelled terrible. I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: OhioMom73

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Was having difficulty getting up from a low arm chair after knee replacement surgery, but the extra 3" makes all the difference. Much, much more comfortable. With careful placement of the risers, the chair is very stable and safe. The look leaves something to be desired, but functionally it's a great solution at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Panfoxth

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality risers. Perfect for a little rise but not too much like the 6 inch ones. Very strong!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I needed some under the bed storage for my apartment, and these risers provided that. I am now able to use the thinner plastic storage boxes under my bed for seasonal clothing. I have had no problems with them falling/moving around so far and I've had them for around 2 months. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Height Bed Risers
customer_reviews.text: I used the bed risers to raise my couch. I just had a total knee surgery and needed to raise the couch to make it easier to get up from sitting. I am so please with the result of the bed risers. So happy that I found them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: How high do you want to raise your bed?
customer_reviews.text: By mistake, I ordered the three inch bed risers which did not raise my bed up as high as I wanted. Too make matters worse, illness and frequent visits to doctors made me too busy to return them. I am using them, no criticism with them, but I do recommend to others, measure before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Stepe

customer_reviews.title: NA
customer_reviews.text: Used this to raise my (low sitting) living room furniture; Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good...But check the shape of the legs on your frame!
customer_reviews.text: These are good for putting extra storage under your bed, but not all the legs on my bed frame fit into these risers. The legs at the foot of the bed are more rectangle, but they fit over the opening of the riser.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Strel

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with a wide area for the bed frame legs. Love having those couple extra inches under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Returned the before I could use them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them to go with new bed but couldn't use them as other set wouldn't work. Returned them .

customer_reviews.title: had hip replacement surgery and needed to raise the arm ...
customer_reviews.text: had hip replacement surgery and needed to raise the arm chair in the livingroom to a safe height for me until i am healed. this did the trick.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and seem durable. Only issue is they move. Not a big deal though.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Works great for under the bed as my bed shirt was too long. I have ordered several sets

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: We had 5" risers, which not only made me feel like I was slipping off the end of the bed, but the sheets were! The 3" risers still have some slippage, but I no longer spend the night struggling to stay in the bed.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for over 3 months now. My bed has skinny legs so I was afraid they would punch through the plastic eventually. So far they have not even made an indent.

customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Using to raise chair legs of 2 chairs for a patient. Thanks for speedy delivery!

customer_reviews.title: It's held up great. No signs of cracking after >1 month
customer_reviews.text: My bed is an all wood frame with tall headboard and between my boyfriend and I there's probably 360 lbs of weight. So far there's been no issues. It's held up great. No signs of cracking after >1 month. Feels stable too. Wood bed pegs feel stable atop the risers.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the 6" risers when more height is needed, or alone if just 3" height is sufficient. Very sturdy. For use on chairs, outdoor chaises, tables, couches, beds...

customer_reviews.text: I Like the height. Perfect for adding storage bins under the bed. Should offer a six pack set. I had to order 2 box sets for my twin beds 6 legs. So I have two extra. Not sure of durability. No one sleeps in that bed.

customer_reviews.text: We're using these risers to elevate the head 6" for a better nights sleep. So far it's working well

This item is a good value for the money. A year later, we've ordered a second set for use on another chair. Perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Weak. Half of them broke shortly after receiving them. Cheap plastic and not heavy duty. Seller was great though, refunded money no questions asked. Just don't buy these risers if you want them to, you know - hold your bed up.

customer_reviews.title: Just the lift I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy. Used it to raise a wood full size bed frame with square legs. Worked perfectly.

customer_reviews.text: Legs of my couch so I could get up easier Looks I covered them with black and white contact Paper and it looks great

customer_reviews.text: Not durable. Have all broken on me. I’m a 135 pound female.

customer_reviews.text: Lifted the bed to just the right height. King bed. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Easy method to raise your bed and create extra storage space, and keep the comforter from dragging on the floor.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a perfect height to raise the head of the bed.

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are strong and stable. I was afraid they would make it difficult to make beds if the bed couldn't couldn't be pushed around on these, but they are sturdy and have deep wells in the top for the bed's wheels (and it would be the same for regular legs), so there's no problem. You can scoot the bed laterally and the wheels just push against the inside of the well of the riser and the whole thing moves. The bed does not fall off of the riser.
customer_reviews.author: Abel & Metra Rosenbush

customer_reviews.title: It's good! Just wish they came in other colors

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because I have casters on my frame ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have casters on my frame and regular risers didn't have a big enough opening. These fit the casters well. Have just put them on, so will see how strong they are.

customer_reviews.text: Had to buy two packages for a King size, but it does the trick. Tall enough for storage underneath, but not too tall that our pupper has a problem jumping off of it.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: this product broke and they will not allow me to return it, it was cheaply made. It said it held up to 300lbs, and I'm only 160 and my bed collapse. I am very disappointed in this product, I would not recommend anyone to buy it. I guess its true with they say you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: O R

customer_reviews.title: Nice Risers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to raise a long ottoman so it could serve as a dining bench. The added height aligned the ottoman perfectly with the dining chairs. The risers are a medium-thick plastic. Not so heavy, but durable enough to hold the weight of the bench and 3 or 4 people sitting on it. It could easily support a bed and create valuable storage room underneath. This was a much more attractive option than my original idea--stacking two cans of cat food together with duct tape. I thought I was being innovative and resourceful. My wife thought it was silly and the cat didn't appreciate the resulting dented cans.
customer_reviews.author: Manny M.

customer_reviews.title: I can barely get out of it with my bad knees. But these risers bring all seats up ...
customer_reviews.text: WheW! What a relief. My furniture sit so low, I can barely get out of it with my bad knees. But these risers bring all seats up 3" which really helps. The cup is pretty big and the legs of the sofa/chair/loveseat fit nicely and the furniture will slide across the floor without popping out. That helps when sliding the seats to clean under them. With my furniture, the risers are stylish and look to be part of the chairs.I bought 3 sets.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived faster than expected. One of the legs recently broke on our dresser. At this time we really can’t invest in new furniture. I thought this would be a better alternative than the metal watch box that was formerly holding it up. This is sturdy and doesn’t wobble when I pull open drawers. This is a day one review , and I am thoroughly happy. If something happens to change my mind I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Bnicemorr

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to raise the head of my bed to make breathing easier. I had been using a wedge pillow that just wasn't doing the job for me. These risers worked great, lifting the bed by a full 3 inches. I have a solid wood headboard and was not certain that the risers would old the weight, but they did. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: What I needed, packaged in a recyclable box and arrived promptly. They appear to be quite strong.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gio

customer_reviews.title: Big but works
customer_reviews.text: There's no mistaking these for part of your bed posts when they're there, they're giant black pillars so they stick out. But they do the job, and they're definitely sturdy. So if you're not concerned with looks but want something reliable that's not going to break, these will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: They tipped over when the bed was pushed sideways while recentering the mattress after making the bed. I think this was due to the thick padding in the carpet, but I wouldn't have these unless I had them on a hard surface. Be aware.

customer_reviews.title: 3IN in Height!
customer_reviews.text: Adds about 3 inches of height to my lounger that I have placed in my livingroom. I love how these lifters don't look bulky, so you won't notice them. The price is perfect compared to other stores.

customer_reviews.text: Double stacked them to raise the head of bed. It’s enough of an incline to help with frequent heartburn but not so much that you feel like you’re going to slide out of bed.

They raise the bed up just enough so I can fit more stuff underneath but not so high that I have to jump up onto my bed.

product_meta.title: Ryehaliligear Easygoing 4-Pack 3 Inch Height Bed Risers, Furniture Riser Bed Riser and Bed Lifts,Helps You Storage Under The Bed
product_meta.description: Elevate furniture with these bed risers. Modify your bed, chair, couch or table easily with this set of 4 bed risers. Each box of risers comes with 4 small bed risers Extra under-bed storage in an instant. Creating new storage space that's neatly out of sight. What is the weight limitation? Easygoing bed and furniture riser is made out of heavy duty super strong plastic. Each Lifter can hold up to1430 lbs., which means a total of 5720 lbs. This is definitely enough for your bed or any other kind of heavy furniture. Get 3 inches of additional height to assist in the process of getting in and out of chairs and sofas. This Heavy Duty Bed Riser Set has the following features: • Safe to use on Hardwood floors. Won't Scratch or Dent them. • Attractive Black Finish that goes well with all furniture Multi functional, can be used in your home or office! Suffer from Acid Reflux?
